outputs.output_descr: The overall goal of this project is to make the Ombudsman office an effective institution to protect and promote human rights as well as rule of law and to provide the population with an effective tool to defend their rights and to address breaches of the law. Through this programme, United Nations Agencies will contribute to bringing it more closely into line with the Paris Principles that are the key international norm governing the structure, independence and mandate of national human rights institutions.

project_descr: Joint United Nations Technical Assistance to Kyrgyz Ombudsman Institute project
